meanings.definition: A small, flat surface on a laptop or computer that is used to move the cursor and perform functions by sliding a finger across it.
meanings.sent1: I use the trackpads on my laptop to navigate websites.
meanings.sent2: The trackpads on modern laptops are very sensitive to touch.
meanings.sent3: My cat thinks the trackpads on my laptop are a great place to take a nap.
meanings.sent4: Her fingers danced gracefully on the trackpads, controlling the cursor effortlessly.
meanings.sent5: The trackpads on his computer were like magic, responding to his every touch.
